thread.title: Dustin S.
thread.title_full: Project Management Academy reviewed by Dustin S.

author: Dustin S.
title: Dustin S.
text: The Project Management Academy is a class act. All of the resources they provide to help their students who attend their programs is phenomenal. You pay for way you get and what you get with The Project Management Academy is Quality and Experience. I passed my PMP with flying colors and I'm grateful that out of all my choice I had when it came to training courses, that I chose the right one...Project Management Academy.
